duties_responsibilities.duty: Supervise and coordinate the SPD team in day to day operations, lead training efforts, and ensure proper policy implementation.
Interview and hire new employees, and coach existing employees to meet company objectives and Customer requirements.
Communicate and foster relationships with all levels of hospital staff and STERIS leadership.
Ensure proper processes are followed by all Sterile Processing team members for compliance with industry standards and regulations.
Deliver Key Performance Indicators (KPI’s) and review quality metrics with Customers.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Healthcare, Science, or related field (Master's preferred)
Active certification in sterile processing/central sterile via CBSPD or IAHCSMM required.
Additional certification for SPD Management/Leadership is preferred.
